name: node_searchsploit
description: Searchsploit is a tool used in security audits which enables the user to search a local copy of exploit-db.com and identify public exploits which can be used against specific software packages. node_searchsploit provides a simple NodeJS interface that allows NodeJS programmers to easily execute searchsploit and handle the output.
author: lastlistener (lastlistener.github.io/About.html)
